name: Where You Look
description:
This incredibly small town has some kinda big problems. Can you join these neighbors together again and make it a nice place to live?

Note: Free-cam look mode only works when you're *not* in Build mode. I'll think of something better for the post-jam version haha.
Fullscreen recommended! Or a PC build for (hopefully) buttery-smooth framerates.

Credits:

  • Ground textures and Skybox from HDRI Haven, water shader is Stylized Water 2 by Staggart Creations & Font is Liberation Sans
  • All other models, animations, layouts, code, music, etc. is mine. Enjoy!

This game was created as a solo project for the GMTK 2021 Jam in 48 hours.
